text: This was the first edition of the tournament. Jason Jung won the title, defeating Rubén Ramírez Hidalgo in the final, 6–4, 6–2. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Chengdu Challenger - Singles 2016 Singles
title: 2016 Chengdu Challenger – Singles
